reviews.text: Bad experience all the way around! Ordered 2 slices of pepperoni üçï and it was so greasy and under cooked. We took 4 paper napkins to drain the grease off the pizza. Under the pizza slices was (surprise) another pool of grease. We had to put the mouthful in a napkin and the other slice we didn‚Äôt even bother. The waitress only took one slice of pepperoni off the bill. My husband just wanted to leave. When they brought the slices they left cold bread and cold pizza sauce in a small bowl on the table for my Stromboli. Who serves cold sauce with no Stromboli together? It sat on the table cold. We are nice people and still tipped and the service was below par. We won‚Äôt be back. We also took the Stromboli home and there was 2 hairs in the food.

Another update: Went back a 3rd time! We shared another 22 inch cheese steak. This time with Cooper cheeae. Yum. I also had them add sweet peppers to the hot peppers and pickles. I have to give a shout out to Preston? He was there when our server wasn't and happily ran for a soda refill for us. I gave him a tip. Super nice kid. Only complaint is the paper they put under the cheese steak  falls apart. Why not just serve it on a plate? Update: we went back. We orderes a large cheese steak and pierogies to share. Holy large!!! It was huge. I couldnt eat all my half and my husband couldnt eat his half!!! It was delish.
I bought a coupon off Clipp. Was excited to try the place. My son graduated from the police acadamy tonight so we needed a place to celebrate . I called a few mins before we arrived. They got a table ready for us. There was initial confusion about who was waiting on us but once we got waited on...he was fantastic. I wish I knew his name so he could get credit. The only complaint our party of 5 had was my salad. There was 3 little pieces of Cucumber and 3 cherry tomatoes. That's it. No Crutton's,onions, or cheese. It was super boring. My Manicotti and garlic bread was good. My daughters pasta, the cheese steak, peanut butter maple burger and French onion burger were all very good. Even the soda was good. The price was spot on. The owner? Came over to ask how our food was. You can tell everyone really wants you to have a good experience. Glad I bought the clipp coupon. We will definitely go back.

We decided to stop in here for lunch. It was my first time in there. The service and the staff was so above and beyond what I thought it would be the food was awesome. this is just not your average pizza joint‚Ä¶Just a note: Deb split her meal with her mom, so her picture of her clams dish shows only half the portion. We would highly recommend if you are looking for a place to eat This is the place to go. They also offer outside seating. this place is awesome. I only regret was I didn‚Äôt take enough pictures‚Ä¶ see our other reviews on our tik tok @debsandwalt

My chicken ceaser salad wasn‚Äôt the greatest with unseasoned chicken but that was okay until I started seeing specs of dirt on my lettuce. I assumed it was a few missed pieces but I started seeing it more and more until one piece really made itself undeniably known. And I realized that someone really just didn‚Äôt wash the romaine lettuce. They just cut it up and served it with no rinsing or anything. Who wants to eat dirt on their lettuce??

The pizza was delicious!  We built our own medium pizza.  The ingredients were high quality (no fat dripping off the pizza).  I gave it 4 stars due to our medium pizza (with no sides or drinks) totaling $56.  üò≥

editorial_summary.overview: Family-owned pizzeria dishing up oven-fired pies with diverse toppings, plus red-sauce classics.

recentReviews.author: Tim Hennessey
recentReviews.text: The pizza was delicious!  We built our own medium pizza.  The ingredients were high quality (no fat dripping off the pizza).  I gave it 4 stars due to our medium pizza (with no sides or drinks) totaling $56.  üò≥

recentReviews.author: Ursula Kemmerer
recentReviews.text:
Another update: Went back a 3rd time! We shared another 22 inch cheese steak. This time with Cooper cheeae. Yum. I also had them add sweet peppers to the hot peppers and pickles. I have to give a shout out to Preston? He was there when our server wasn't and happily ran for a soda refill for us. I gave him a tip. Super nice kid. Only complaint is the paper they put under the cheese steak  falls apart. Why not just serve it on a plate? Update: we went back. We orderes a large cheese steak and pierogies to share. Holy large!!! It was huge. I couldnt eat all my half and my husband couldnt eat his half!!! It was delish.
I bought a coupon off Clipp. Was excited to try the place. My son graduated from the police acadamy tonight so we needed a place to celebrate . I called a few mins before we arrived. They got a table ready for us. There was initial confusion about who was waiting on us but once we got waited on...he was fantastic. I wish I knew his name so he could get credit. The only complaint our party of 5 had was my salad. There was 3 little pieces of Cucumber and 3 cherry tomatoes. That's it. No Crutton's,onions, or cheese. It was super boring. My Manicotti and garlic bread was good. My daughters pasta, the cheese steak, peanut butter maple burger and French onion burger were all very good. Even the soda was good. The price was spot on. The owner? Came over to ask how our food was. You can tell everyone really wants you to have a good experience. Glad I bought the clipp coupon. We will definitely go back.

recentReviews.author: Maryam J
recentReviews.text: My chicken ceaser salad wasn‚Äôt the greatest with unseasoned chicken but that was okay until I started seeing specs of dirt on my lettuce. I assumed it was a few missed pieces but I started seeing it more and more until one piece really made itself undeniably known. And I realized that someone really just didn‚Äôt wash the romaine lettuce. They just cut it up and served it with no rinsing or anything. Who wants to eat dirt on their lettuce??

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.0/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the attentive and proactive service, with staff going above and beyond to ensure a great dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant offers large portion sizes that are perfect for sharing, making it ideal for group celebrations and family gatherings. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The high quality of ingredients, especially in dishes like the cheese steak and pizza, is frequently praised by customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to food quality concerns (greasy pizza, cold sauce, hairs in food, unwashed lettuce) - review management can address this concern
Lack of ambiance and atmosphere awareness, particularly with serving presentation (cold sauce served separately, paper falling apart under cheesesteak) - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor online visibility and competition issues, as indicated by the need for coupons to attract customers - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
